title: Rustic Bakewell tart
description: This rough Bakewell tart is enclosed in pastry, giving a really rustic feel (and no worries about even edges).
ingredients: 100g/3½oz caster sugar, plus extra for dusting
1 free-range egg, beaten, plus 1 free-range egg yolk
500g/1lb 2oz ready-made shortcrust pastry (use all butter if possible)
